Articles.Content: no modding monday? wehehehe! squad giving us some clue.. i like it.. \*grinning\*![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> no modding monday? wehehehe! squad giving us some clue.. i like it.. \*grinning\*![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Monday was the second day of Easter here where I live, it is a public holiday. I imagine it is the same in Mexico.

> 
> no modding monday? wehehehe! squad giving us some clue.. i like it.. \*grinning\*![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I am guessing the clue is that they like chocolate eggs? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
It means there is a new Easter egg!
How would that be a clue to a new easter egg? Maybe they are just really busy right now.

> 
> no modding monday? wehehehe! squad giving us some clue.. i like it.. \*grinning\*![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Easter weekend. Lots of businesses are closed on Friday and Monday.

I wouldn't put too much stock into this.

> 
> Monday was the second day of Easter here where I live, it is a public holiday. I imagine it is the same in Mexico.

so far.. lol i'm from philippines.. tuesday in mexico is wednesday in philippines? today is wednesday here..![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Kerbal egg pods for everyone

everyone love it..![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
I wouldn't read much into it. There weren't any twitter posts yesterday either.
I think it prudent to point out that Devnote Tuesdays usually get posted somewhere between 2 and 7 hours from when this post was made. So definitely don't read too much into it not being up yet.

> 
> so far.. lol i'm from philippines.. tuesday in mexico is wednesday in philippines? today is wednesday here..![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Well, you posting at 1 AM Wednesday morning might have something to do with it...

But yeah, the Philippines are 16 hours ahead of most of Mexico. At the time of your post, it was 12:14 Tuesday afternoon in Mexico City.
Usually the posts seem to come in around 18:10 EST. It's presently 14:39.
Yeah, the Dev Tuesdays generally come between noon and 4 PM, PST.

> 
> How would that be a clue to a new easter egg? Maybe they are just really busy right now.

That - I believe - was a joke relating to a certain holiday that may have just passed by.

You guys make me think of all those guys starving for Half-life 3 that scream ***HALF LIFE 3 CONFIRMED!*** every time they see the number 3 somewhere... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

EDIT : i hope we still get the Devnotes tonight!
